title: Saybrook-on-the-Lake, Ohio
text:
Saybrook-on-the-Lake is an <a href="unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> and <a href="census-designated%20place">census-designated place</a> (CDP) on the shore of <a href="Lake%20Erie">Lake Erie</a> in <a href="Ashtabula%20County%2C%20Ohio">Ashtabula County</a>, <a href="Ohio">Ohio</a>, United States. It was first listed as a CDP prior to the <a href="2020%20United%20States%20census">2020 census</a>.
The CDP is in northern Ashtabula County, in the northwest corner of <a href="Saybrook%20Township%2C%20Ashtabula%20County%2C%20Ohio">Saybrook Township</a>. It is bordered to the north by Lake Erie, to the west by <a href="Geneva%20Township%2C%20Ashtabula%20County%2C%20Ohio">Geneva Township</a>, and to the east by <a href="Ohio%20State%20Route%2045">Ohio State Route 45</a>. <a href="Ohio%20State%20Route%20531">State Route 531</a> is the main road through the community, paralleling the lakeshore and leading east-northeast to <a href="Ashtabula%20Harbour%20Commercial%20District">Ashtabula Harbour</a> and west-southwest to <a href="Geneva-on-the-Lake%2C%20Ohio">Geneva-on-the-Lake</a>. State Route 45 leads south to <a href="U.S.%20Route%2020">U.S. Route 20</a> in Saybrook Township and to <a href="Interstate%2090">Interstate 90</a> at <a href="Austinburg%2C%20Ohio">Austinburg</a>.
